section.p: Kind of location where the incident occurred

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11482 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.88"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11662)/@code="74496-1" Injury location ICD code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:11202)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11387), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM) (CONF:11203)
NEMSIS trace: eScene.09 (Incident location type) See NEMSIS recommended subset at https://nemsis.org/technical-resources/version-3/version-3-resources/. ICD-10 CM contains "place of occurrence of external cause" under code Y92.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11662)/@code="74496-1" Injury location ICD code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:11202)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11387), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM) (CONF:11203)
NEMSIS trace: eScene.09 (Incident location type) See NEMSIS recommended subset at https://nemsis.org/technical-resources/version-3/version-3-resources/. ICD-10 CM contains "place of occurrence of external cause" under code Y92.

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="RQO"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.88" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="74496-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Injury location ICD code"/> <value xsi:type="CD" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.90"/> </observation>
